snippet.title: The Golden Eyed Ghosts - Official Trailer | Re-MIX Showcase July 2023
snippet.description: Here's your look at the trailer for The Golden Eyed Ghosts, an upcoming dark fantasy soulslike game inspired by the legacy of the Zelda adventures. Explore various locations like dark forests and more in this trailer, and get ready to embark on an adventure set in the crumbling kingdom of Andromeda. In The Golden Eyed Ghosts, you play as the exiled warrior Orion, and must search for a way to restore his memories and unravel a terrifying conspiracy.
